body_html: I've created an example script which lets you create train, validation and test splits on torchvision datasets (i.e. from torchvision.datasets) with support for shuffling, transformations and optional grid plotting of the data. It should be applicable to any other dataset in that library with some minor tweaking.
body_text: I've created an example script which lets you create train, validation and test splits on torchvision datasets (i.e. from torchvision.datasets) with support for shuffling, transformations and optional grid plotting of the data. It should be applicable to any other dataset in that library with some minor tweaking.
body: I've created an example [script](https://gist.github.com/kevinzakka/d33bf8d6c7f06a9d8c76d97a7879f5cb) which lets you create train, validation and test splits on torchvision datasets (i.e. from torchvision.datasets) with support for shuffling, transformations and optional grid plotting of the data. It should be applicable to any other dataset in that library with some minor tweaking.
